cbinstall.name: CB Mamblog Tab
cbinstall.author: JoomlaJoe - Thanks to Jeffrey Hill for pagination and search additions
cbinstall.description: Provides a User Tab that shows all Mamblog entries written by the user.

param.name: entriesNumber
param.label: Number of blog entries to display
param.description: If showing all posts, this is the number of posts per page. If showing only last ones, this is the number of blog entries to show. Default is 10

param.name: pagingEnabled
param.label: Show all blogs with paging
param.description: If set to -show all- all blog entries will become visible in the user profile. Otherwise, only the last entries will be visible.

param.name: searchEnabled
param.label: Allow search function
param.description: IMPORTANT: Show all blog entries must also be set. Allows a search on user blog entries.
